Reference

Running Hector

newcore()

Create and initialize a new hector instance

format(<hcore>) print(<hcore>)

Hector instance object methods

run()

Run the Hector climate model

reset()

Reset a Hector instance to an earlier date

shutdown()

Shutdown a hector instance

runscenario()

Run a single scenario

Setting and retrieving data

fetchvars()

Fetch results from a running Hector core

setvar()

Set values for a Hector variable

sendmessage()

Send a message to a Hector instance

getdate() isactive() startdate() enddate() getname()

Utility functions for Hector instances

getunits()

Get the hector unit strings for one or more variables

Variable and component identifiers

LAND_CFLUX() ATMOSPHERIC_CO2() NPP() ATMOSPHERIC_C() FFI_EMISSIONS() LUC_EMISSIONS() VEG_C() DETRITUS_C() SOIL_C() NPP_FLUX0()

Identifiers for variables in the Hector carbon cycle component

ATMOSPHERIC_N2O() PREINDUSTRIAL_N2O() PREINDUSTRIAL_O3() ATMOSPHERIC_O3()

Identifiers for miscellaneous concentrations not elsewhere described

create_biome()

Create new biome

create_biome_impl()

Create a biome

delete_biome_impl()

Delete a biome

EMISSIONS_BC() EMISSIONS_N2O() EMISSIONS_NOX() EMISSIONS_CO() EMISSIONS_NMVOC() EMISSIONS_OC()

Identifiers for miscellaneous emissions not elsewhere described

RF_TOTAL() RF_T_ALBEDO() RF_CO2() RF_N2O() RF_H2O() RF_O3() RF_BC() RF_OC() RF_SO2D() RF_SO2I() RF_SO2() RF_VOL() RF_CH4()

Identifiers for capabilities in the Hector forcing component

get_biome_inits()

Retrieve the initial conditions and parameters for a given biome

get_biome_list()

Retrieve the current list of biomes for a Hector instance

EMISSIONS_CF4() EMISSIONS_C2F6() EMISSIONS_HFC23() EMISSIONS_HFC32() EMISSIONS_HFC4310() EMISSIONS_HFC125() EMISSIONS_HFC134A() EMISSIONS_HFC143A() EMISSIONS_HFC227EA() EMISSIONS_HFC245FA() EMISSIONS_SF6() EMISSIONS_CFC11() EMISSIONS_CFC12() EMISSIONS_CFC113() EMISSIONS_CFC114() EMISSIONS_CFC115() EMISSIONS_CCL4() EMISSIONS_CH3CCL3() EMISSIONS_HCF22() EMISSIONS_HCF141B() EMISSIONS_HCF142B() EMISSIONS_HALON1211() EMISSIONS_HALON1301() EMISSIONS_HALON2402() EMISSIONS_CH3CL() EMISSIONS_CH3BR()

Identifiers for halocarbon emissions

RF_CF4() RF_C2F6() RF_HFC23() RF_HFC32() RF_HFC4310() RF_HFC125() RF_HFC134A() RF_HFC143A() RF_HFC227EA() RF_HFC245FA() RF_SF6() RF_CFC11() RF_CFC12() RF_CFC113() RF_CFC114() RF_CFC115() RF_CCL4() RF_CH3CCL3() RF_HCF22() RF_HCF141B() RF_HCF142B() RF_HALON1211() RF_HALON1301() RF_HALON2402() RF_CH3CL() RF_CH3BR()

Identifiers for halocarbon forcings

LL_DEBUG() LL_NOTICE() LL_WARNING() LL_SEVERE()

Hector logging levels

ATMOSPHERIC_CH4() PREINDUSTRIAL_CH4() EMISSIONS_CH4() NATURAL_CH4() LIFETIME_SOIL() LIFETIME_STRAT()

Identifiers for quantities in the methane component

OCEAN_CFLUX() OCEAN_C() OCEAN_C_HL() OCEAN_C_LL() OCEAN_C_IO() OCEAN_C_DO() TT() TU() TWI() TID() PH_HL() PH_LL() ATM_OCEAN_FLUX_HL() ATM_OCEAN_FLUX_LL() PCO2_HL() PCO2_LL() DIC_HL() DIC_LL() TEMP_HL() TEMP_LL() CO3_LL() CO3_HL()

Identifiers for quantities in the ocean component

PREINDUSTRIAL_CO2() Q10_RH() BETA() WARMINGFACTOR() F_NPPV() F_NPPD() F_LITTERD() F_LUCV() F_LUCD() ECS() AERO_SCALE() VOLCANIC_SCALE() DIFFUSIVITY()

Identifiers for model parameters

rename_biome()

Rename an existing biome

NATURAL_SO2() Y2000_SO2() EMISSIONS_SO2() VOLCANIC_SO2()

Identifiers for quantities in the SO2 component

split_biome()

Create new biomes by splitting up an existing biome

GLOBAL_TEMP() GLOBAL_TEMPEQ() OCEAN_SURFACE_TEMP() OCEAN_AIR_TEMP() LAND_TEMP() FLUX_MIXED() FLUX_INTERIOR() HEAT_FLUX()

Identifiers for variables associated with the temperature component
